content.text: I love to go to comic cons and dress up with my husband.
Wow that sounds like a lot of fun! I would love to learn how to make my own clothes so I can cosplay.
That's a great idea! I love making my own costumes. It's really rewarding to see something you've made come together.
I bet! I do love to sew and I'm pretty good at it so I think I could probably do it.
That's awesome! I'm sure you'd do a great job. I'm more into the creative side of things, so I don't really do much sewing myself.
Well I'm sure your costumes are amazing! I love seeing all the creative and intricate details people put into their cosplays.
Thank you! I try my best! I love being able to express myself through my costumes and it's so much fun to share my love of comics and other fandoms with others.
That's so awesome! I love that about comic cons. It's a place where people can come together and celebrate their love of all things geeky.
Do you have any plans to go to any comic cons this year?
I'm not sure yet! I'm hoping to go to a few, but I haven't decided which ones yet.
Well if you do, I hope to see you there!
Same! It would be great to meet you!
